official_title: A bill for the relief of Fabrimetrics, Incorporated.

summary.text: Allows a named corporation to enter or withdraw from warehouse for consumption during a limited period a specified quantity of fabrics, of strips, that are a product of the Republic of Korea and provided for in the Tariff Schedules of the United States.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Fabrimetrics, Incorporated.
